original_text: Judah's king did not obey his agreement with the king of Babylon. He had promised to serve Babylon's king but instead he turned against him. He did not do what he had promised to do, so he will not escape.
korean_text: 그가 이미 손을 내밀어 언약하였거늘 맹세를 업신여겨 언약을 배반하고 이 모든 일을 행하였으니 피하지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: Judah's king did not obey his agreement
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 왕은 그의 약속을 지키지 않았다

sentences.original_text: He had promised to serve Babylon's king
but instead he turned against him
He did not do what he had promised to do

sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 벗어날 수 없을 것이다
